name: coping_device
description:
Coping_device is a narrative-driven puzzle game about anxiety.

Leylo, a soon-to-graduate Computer Science major, experiences a panic attack when she discovers that she has accidentally corrupted her spring semester final project amidst her exhaustion.  Now, she must navigate a once-familiar campus that has become twisted and morphed by her anxiety in order to find a safe place and a good friend to help her calm down. Her only aid is a strange new application on her cell phone.
